statements: SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_phone, client_address FROM clients WHERE client_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_email, client_address FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_address = 'New York, USA';
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY client_name ASC
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_phone, client_address FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_phone IS NOT NULL AND client_address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_address FROM clients WHERE client_address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY client_id ASC, client_name ASC
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_email, wealth_manager_id FROM clients WHERE wealth_manager_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT full_name, email FROM clients WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_id, full_name, email FROM clients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email, address FROM clients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT client_id, full_name, email, address, date_of_birth FROM clients ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT client_id, full_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM clients INNER JOIN transactions ON clients.client_id = transactions.client_id GROUP BY client_id, full_name;
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_phone FROM Clients WHERE client_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM Accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Clients WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM Accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT client_name, account_type, transaction_type FROM Clients INNER JOIN Accounts ON Clients.client_id = Accounts.client_id INNER JOIN Transactions ON Accounts.account_id = Transactions.account_id WHERE Clients.client_name LIKE '%John%' AND Transactions.transaction_amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM clients
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM clients
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM accounts
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM transactions
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, role FROM employees
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT clients.first_name, accounts.balance FROM clients JOIN accounts ON clients.client_id = accounts.client_id WHERE clients.client_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_date, SUM(amount) FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_date ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Client_information;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Client_information WHERE client_balance > 1000;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM Client_information ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT account_type, account_balance FROM Account_information WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Client_information WHERE client_balance > 1000 ORDER BY client_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Account_information WHERE account_type = 'Savings' AND account_balance < 0
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM Transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM Employee_information WHERE employee_salary > 50000 AND employee_position = 'Manager'
SELECT * FROM Compliance_audit WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND audit_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY audit_date ASC
